alert.note: Alert for Curry County; Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 21 at 3:13PM MDT until March 22 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT TUESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, north winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the second Wind Advisory, north winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Curry County, Eastern San Miguel County and Far Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, from 7 AM to 7 PM MDT Tuesday. For the second Wind Advisory, until 6 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized areas of blowing snow will be possible, creating reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands
